pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Learn About Ambiance's Data Protection Measures Ambiance Home About us Products Contacts Privacy Policy At Ambiance, we value the privacy of our visitors and customers. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of personal information we collect, how we use it, and how we protect your privacy. Information We Collect We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us, such as your name, email address, phone number, and any other information you choose to provide when contacting us or using our services. How We Use Your Information We may use the information we collect for various purposes, including: Responding to your inquiries and providing customer support Processing and fulfilling your orders Sending you promotional emails and newsletters Improving our products and services Information Sharing and Disclosure We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this Privacy Policy or as required by law. Security We take reasonable measures to protect the security of your personal information and prevent unauthorized access or disclosure.
